Klasse GameController

java.lang.Object
game.GameController
public class GameController extends Object
The GameController class is the heart of the model.
It suplies the controller with the necessary get and set methods and connects the individual components of the model.

  • Konstruktorübersicht

    Konstruktoren
    Konstruktor
    Beschreibung
    GameController()
    Instantiates a new Object of type GameController.
    Sets for example the starting position of the player.

  • Konstruktordetails

    • GameController

      public GameController()
      Instantiates a new Object of type GameController.
      Sets for example the starting position of the player.

  • Methodendetails

    • update

      public void update()
      Makes the changes to the world that are directely timed by ticks.
      E.g. moves the items on the conveyor belts.

    • movePlayer

      public void movePlayer(char direction)
      Moves the player in the given direction/ sets the new player position.
      The characters encoding the movement direction are set as follows:
      Q W E
      A _ D
      Y S C
      Parameter:
      direction - The direction the player is moving in.

    • chooseBuildingToPlace

      public void chooseBuildingToPlace(String buildingType)
      Sets the building that the player plans to place next.
      Parameter:
      buildingType - The type of building given by a string.

    • cancelPlacement

      public void cancelPlacement()
      Removes the chosen building to be placed next.

    • rotateBuilding

      public void rotateBuilding()
      Rotates the building that is planned to be placed next.

    • placeBuilding

      public void placeBuilding()
      Finally places the building (if possible) that was chosen to be placed next.
      Makes also small but necessary changes to some building types.

    • removeBuilding

      public void removeBuilding()
      Removes the building on the tile the player is standing on.

    • addItemToInventory

      public static boolean addItemToInventory(Item item)
      Adds the given item to the inventory.
      Parameter:
      item - The item to be added to the inventory.
      Gibt zurück:
      Returns wheter the item has been added sucessfully or not

    • getPosX

      public int getPosX()
      Returns the x position of the tile the player is standing on.
      Gibt zurück:
      The x coordinate

    • getPosY

      public int getPosY()
      Returns the y position of the tile the player is standing on.
      Gibt zurück:
      The y coordinate

    • getOffsetX

      public float getOffsetX()
      Returns the relative x position of the player on the tile they are standing on.
      Gibt zurück:
      The relative x position
      x is in [-0.5, 0.5)

    • getOffsetY

      public float getOffsetY()
      Returns the relative y position of the player on the tile they are standing on.
      Gibt zurück:
      The relative y position
      y is in [-0.5, 0.5)

    • getDirection

      public char getDirection()
      Returns the movement direction of the player.
      Gibt zurück:
      The movement direction
      Q W E
      A _ D
      Y S C
